TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, any water that is evaporated by heat is gone, never to return. Happy?

 

I wish for this forum to fully support BBCode and the WYSIWYG Editor.

Granted, but it becomes a chatroom reminiscent of the ancient Internet Era.

 

I wish for space!

Granted, you now have additional space on your hard drive. Have fun with the extra kilobyte of data!

 

 

I wishz for NASA to launch a Venus rover, which functions perfect at all times, gives us that AWESOME science, and can drive around.

Granted, but the NASA tech tree is fully unlocked and they forgot a camera so it becomes a worthless waste of funds.

I wish that Pluto can into Planet.

Granted, but too bad pluto is the death star and starts to attack earth, and we are helpless cuz its illegal to destroy celestial bodies.

I wish for a srb

Granted. The "SRB" is am A-class model rocket engine that turns into a cubic nanometer of hydrogen when lit.

I wish for my math teacher to stop being obsessed with Pinocchio.

Granted, he is addicted to Frozen. Enjoy countless rerun torture...

 

I wish for NASA to launch a Venus rover, which always functions properly, and gives us good data of the Venusian surface

Granted, but the craft missed Venus.

I wish for more hours in the day.

Granted. The earth abruptly stops spinning, sending everything not bolted down, including people, flying eastward at jetliner velocities except what is very close to the poles.

I wish for moar booster

Granted, but every booster is identical to the right booster from STS-51-L.

I wish for a working super-heavy SSTO.

Granted. It weighs a ten a hundred thousand metric tons, and can lift up to 1 cubesat to orbit. Then it doesn't have enough fuel to deorbit.

I wish Earth had rings.

Edited December 5, 2015 by cubinator
moar booster

Granted, Earth now has an abundance of onion rings.

I wish I was Aiden Pearce.

Granted, you are also Illuminati Confirmed, everyone shoots you to death.

 

 

I wish for NASA to launch a Venus rover, which gets to the surface of Venus safely, can drive around, and is able to give us good knowledge of the Venusian surface

Granted. The parachutes don't deploy, causing the solar panels to break on impact. NASA drives it around for a few hours, making some measurements and taking a few pictures, before the rover's battery dies.

I wish for all of the content from Alex Jones' various websites to be deleted, but people's memories of them still remain. No other websites get affected.

Granted, the governments are now able to assassinate every conspiracy theorist, relocate every conspiracy website to the deep web, and test their weapons of mass destruction with new freedom.

I wish SpaceplaneAddict wasn't such a spaceplane addict.

Granted, but now he's even more obsessed with his Venusian rover project.

I wish for a Python from Elite: Dangerous.

Granted, but you got a real python.

I wish for b9 to be updated.

Granted. KSP updates at the same time and b9 is broken again.

I wish for my computer to work when I switch the graphics card later today.

Granted.  New graphics card is great, until the monitor burns out.

I wish for Kerbal Engineer Redux & Mechjeb to be updated

Granted, but they release with broken code that takes months to patch and fix.

 

I wish my landlady was still married to my boss and not involved in a bitter separation I'm getting caught in the middle of.

Edited December 6, 2015 by Pronoes

21 minutes ago, Pronoes said:

Granted, but they release with broken code that takes months to patch and fix.

 

I wish my landlady was still married to my boss and not involved in a bitter separation I'm getting caught in the middle of.

Um... What? I do not understand.
I wish I knew why Kamikaze pilots bothered wearing safety helmets.
Granted, you now understand their beliefs and techniques, however, you agree with their motives and soon die in a kamikaze yourself.

Wish not wished therefore auto corrupted.

 

 

I wish for functional Venus rover landing that always works perfectly

And can drive , lands perfectly, can generate self-sustaining power, has communications and has scientific instruments

Granted, but the RTGs explode due to excessive overheating. (BTW, you can't spam the same wish with more specifics. It's a rule as to keep the game creative.)

I wish people knew what my avatar was.

 

 

Quote
14 hours ago, SpaceplaneAddict said:

Wish not wished therefore auto corrupted.

 

(whoops, guess I didn't wish anything that time...)

Edited December 8, 2015 by CommanderCoye
